Title: Establishes a climate change education grant program
Summary: Establishes a climate change education grant program to award grants to eligible applicants to support climate change education grant programs for young people or to provide optional teacher training or professional development programs relevant to the advance of climate change literacy in young people.
LawCode: Add ยง1884, Pub Auth L; amd ยง305, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the education law, in relation to establishing a climate change education grant program
